name: Les Sept Phalanges de Sialia Borjes
name_original: Les Sept Phalanges de Sialia Borjes
description:
THE SEVEN KNUCKLES OF SIALIA BORJES

You are Sura, an agent of Réseau, and you have been dispached to recover and secure a highly sensitive asset.
Cover the tracks of the secret service agency you work for, who've made a mess neutralizing a rogue agent.
Betray. Get betrayed. Uncover new ennemies. Try to break free. Fail.
Meet an ancient force who's been reduced to 7 small bones from her left hand.

A extra short visual novel with 3 different endings.

Quick warning!
Murder, text depiction of violence, visual depiction of body horror.
It's not hardcore gore, I think it's sfw.

----------------
NOTES.
A short project I worked on to familiarize myself with RPG MAKER MV, force myself to do some music with my old guitar that was gathering dust, and also try working on some exploration system for a future project I have in mind.

Each playthrough takes between 5 to 10 minutes, you can see the entire game in under an hour. 

All text, sound, visuals by me - font  M+ 1M regular,  by M+ Fonts.
Maybe some visual elements and sounds left from the base assets of RPG Maker.

Made with RPG Maker MV, LMMS, Photoshop, Audacity, and Bosca Ceoil. And Wordpad.

-
Enjoy :)
